mapper.select:
select
from qx_invite where 1 = 1 and deleted = 0
and sn like CONCAT('%', #{paramCondition.sn}, '%')
SELECT a.invite_id AS inviteId, a.user_id AS userId, a.status, b.mobile FROM qx_invite_apply a LEFT JOIN qx_user b ON a.user_id = b.id WHERE a.invite_id = #{inviteId}

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.created_time AS "createdTime", a.sn AS "sn", a.inviter AS "inviter", a.invitee AS "invitee", a.invite_time AS "inviteTime", a.invite_type AS "inviteType", a.date_type_id AS "dateTypeId", a.gift_id AS "giftId", a.longitude AS "longitude", a.latitude AS "latitude", a.province AS "province", a.city AS "city", a.district AS "district", a.street AS "street", a.streetNumber AS "streetNumber", a.status AS "status", a.invite_way AS "inviteWay", a.content AS "content", a.shop AS "shop" FROM qx_invite a INNER JOIN qx_user b ON a.inviter = b.id WHERE a.id = #{inviteId}
